name: SOO LINE RAILROAD COMPANY
govEntities: Office of the Vice President of the United States
sampleDescriptions: Lobby on issues related to railroads and relevant agencies, such as, DOT, FRA, STB, NMB, RRB, and PHMSA. Additionally, lobby on issues related to trade and tariffs.
